about_the_game: The EMD SD70ACe is the successor to the SD70MAC, with changes made to comply with stricter emissions standards. These units, equipped with a EMD 16-710-G3C-T2 prime mover, are rated at 4300HP (3200KW); with later 'Tier 3' models rated at 4500HP (3400KW). This unit, EMDX 2012, is a Tier 3 demonstrator unit sent by EMD to railroads for them to trial the latest Tier 3 SD70ACe technologies at the time on their roads; such as during mid to late 2011 with Norfolk Southern.
detailed_description: The EMD SD70ACe is the successor to the SD70MAC, with changes made to comply with stricter emissions standards. These units, equipped with a EMD 16-710-G3C-T2 prime mover, are rated at 4300HP (3200KW); with later 'Tier 3' models rated at 4500HP (3400KW). This unit, EMDX 2012, is a Tier 3 demonstrator unit sent by EMD to railroads for them to trial the latest Tier 3 SD70ACe technologies at the time on their roads; such as during mid to late 2011 with Norfolk Southern.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Trainz 2022 DLC - EMD SD70ACe Demonstrator 2012

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: This unit, EMDX 2012, is the SD70ACe Tier 3 demonstrator unit sent by EMD to railroads for them to trial the latest Tier 3 SD70ACe technologies.
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German
